channel.title: CVE Feed for PluginOps -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PluginOps -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-33328|2024-10-10T17:30:14.843Z -- pluginops -- mailchimp%20subscribe%20form
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PluginOps MailChimp Subscribe Form plugin <=Â 4.0.9.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-43345|2024-08-19T19:42:36.943Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-31923|2024-08-02T01:59:50.673Z -- pluginops -- feather%20login%20page
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PluginOps Feather Login Page.This issue affects Feather Login Page: from n/a through 1.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-31923|2024-04-15T09:25:05.204Z -- pluginops -- feather%20login%20page
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PluginOps Feather Login Page.This issue affects Feather Login Page: from n/a through 1.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-34752|2024-06-04T17:42:43.098Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.1.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-31923|2024-07-17T18:52:36.071Z -- pluginops -- feather%20login%20page
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PluginOps Feather Login Page.This issue affects Feather Login Page: from n/a through 1.1.5.
